thread.title: Exclusive: Huma Qureshi to play an underworld gangster in ‘Madam X’
thread.title_full: Exclusive: Huma Qureshi to play an underworld gangster in ‘Madam X’

author: Deccan
title: Exclusive: Huma Qureshi to play an underworld gangster in ‘Madam X’
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Rohit Bhatnagar | October 01, 2015, 18.25 pm Mumbai: Voluptuous beauty who is known for her bold and sensuous avatar, Huma Qureshi will now play a d-glam role of a gangster based in Meerut city. Last seen in an intense role of a prostitute in ‘Badlapur’, Huma will be seen in a different role altogether in ‘Madam X’. A close source confirmed, Huma will play a double role in director Tigmanshu Dhulia’s next ‘Madam X’, produced by Anurag Kashyap.
The actress is currently shooting for director Gurinder Chaddha’s next ‘The Viceroy House’ opposite Manish Dayal in Jodhpur. Source further added, Huma will undergo immense training of shooting and high octane stunts. It will be interesting to see Huma playing a gangster on silver screen.
